name: Ambient DM DLC - Commercial License
detailed_description:
Have a patreon supported podcast, like streaming for donations, or just enjoy recording your sessions to share with your subscribers on twitch? We've had many contacts regarding the commercial use of Ambient DM, and now we are proud to say that the Commercial License is now available! With this license you can be confident that any income from commercial use of Ambient DM is fully legal.


Any Custom Files that you add to Ambient DM are not covered under the Commercial License DLC.

short_description: Have a patreon supported podcast, like streaming for donations, or just enjoy recording your sessions to share with your subscribers on twitch? With this license you can be confident that any income from commercial use of Ambient DM is fully legal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista and Above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Phenom II x4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 Ghz Dual Core or AMD Athlon 2.6 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 7870/R9 270 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti/760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Device

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Ambient DM DLC - Commercial License
